roles.description:
Represents a random Mafia-aligned role that attends the Mafia night meeting

Cannot be a Negative Utility or VIP role

Cannot be an Extra KP role unless it is Single-Use
roles.name: (Random Balanced Meeting Mafia)

roles.description: Represents one of the following roles: @{role:Bus Cop], @{role:Cop], @{role:Confused Cop], @{role:Insane Cop], @{role:Paranoid Cop], @{role:Parity Cop], @{role:Vanilla Cop], or @{role:Naive Cop]
roles.name: (Random Cop)

roles.description: Represents a random Mafia-aligned role that attends the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: (Random Meeting Mafia)

roles.description: Represents a random Third Party role that is neither Non-Faction Scum nor @{role:Cult] or @{role:Liaison]
roles.name: (Random Non-Scum Third Party)

roles.description: Represents a random Mafia-aligned role that does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: (Random Nonmeeting Mafia)

roles.description: Represents a random Town-aligned role that sees self as @{role:Villager] and has a power that activates upon being condemned
roles.name: (Random On-Condemn Villager)

roles.description: Represents a random Town-aligned power role that does not see self as @{role:Villager]
roles.name: (Random PR)

roles.description: Represents one of the following roles: @{role:Bodyguard], @{role:Doctor], @{role:Guardian], @{role:Luckyguard], @{role:Medic], @{role:Nurse], or @{role:Veterinarian]
roles.name: (Random Protector)

roles.description: Represents a random Third Party role
roles.name: (Random Third Party)

roles.description:
Represents a random Town-aligned role that sees self as @{role:Villager]

‌
roles.name: (Random Villager)

roles.description:
Once per game, may overturn the condemning vote and choose a new player to condemn instead

Cannot overturn when the majority vote is either No one or themselves
roles.name: Administrator

roles.description:
Each day, may send anonymous messages to any non-Town-aligned role 

Anonymous messages look identical to @{role:Spy]
roles.name: Agent

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a player to visit and hide behind

Will be protected from night kills while hiding unless targeted using @{role:Strongman]

If the visited player is killed, the Agoraphobe will die as well
roles.name: Agoraphobe

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Tourist]

Each night, must visit and block a player from performing night actions that require a visit
roles.name: Alcoholic

roles.description:
Once per game, may visit a dead player and convert to their role

Cannot win without converting
roles.name: Amnesiac

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a non-Mafia faction player and perform one of three actions

May block them from performing visiting night actions and break their items

May frame them as "sided with the Mafia" and steal their items

May learn their role

Each action may only be performed once
roles.name: Anarchist

roles.description:
Sees self as a @{role:Villager]

Each day, announces the names of all players who visited them the night before

If visited by a group (e.g. the Mafia), only one member’s name will be announced
roles.name: Announcer

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and give them a [Vest]
roles.name: Armorer

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and give them a [Gun]
roles.name: Arms Dealer

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a player to visit and kill

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Assassin

roles.description:
Basic Mafia-aligned role

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Associate

roles.description: Each night, may choose a player to visit and see what items they have
roles.name: Auditor

roles.description: Once per game, may give a [Will] to another player at night
roles.name: Author

roles.description:
Each night, may give a player a [Bee Bomb]

Bee Bombs from the Bee Thief will explode randomly within 2-4 nights
roles.name: Bee Thief

roles.description:
Each night, may give a player a [Bee Bomb]

Chooses how long until the Bee Bomb explodes

Cannot be killed by Bee Bombs

Town cannot win while Beekeeper is alive

Wins if alive in final 2
roles.name: Beekeeper

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and discover sins they commit that night

If the sinner kills another, they will be guilty of Wrath 

If the sinner converts or is converted, they will be guilty of Heresy 

If the sinner blocks another’s night action or has their night action blocked, they will be guilty of Sloth 

Only successful sins will be discovered and brought to the light
roles.name: Bishop

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and give them a [Knife]
roles.name: Blade Master

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and protect a player from being killed that night

The first time they protect a player, the killer will die

The second time they protect a player, the Bodyguard will die

If multiple attempts are made at once, the chosen player will die
roles.name: Bodyguard

roles.description:
Once per game, during either the day or at night, may kill a player

If the power is used during the day, kills immediately

If the power is used at night, Bolthus visits, and the kill is strengthened and pierces through protections

If another Bolthus, a @{role:Moko] or a @{role:Tapioca] are killed with this power, the Bolthus dies
roles.name: Bolthus

roles.description:
If killed, the Bomb will explode and kill the player that targeted them as well

If killed by a night meeting (e.g. the Mafia), one member will be chosen at random to explode 

If targeted by multiple night kills, the explosion will kill one player from each group
roles.name: Bomb

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and block all others that would visit them from performing night actions

Does not block night meeting actions from targeting the visited player
roles.name: Bouncer

roles.description:
Starts with a [Vest]

Each day, will be given a bounty for a random player

Gains a point if their target dies the day they were assigned

Wins when they reach 3 points or if alive in final 2

Town cannot win while Bounty Hunter is alive
roles.name: Bounty Hunter

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Whenever Bozoman's role would be revealed or seen by a player, a random role included in the setup will be shown instead

Will not reveal as @{role:Villager], @{role:Soloman], @{role:Impostor], or Bozoman
roles.name: Bozoman

roles.description: Once per game, can visit a player from another faction and convert them into a @{role:Villager]
roles.name: Brainwasher

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

If attempted to be killed, will bleed for a day before dying
roles.name: Bruiser

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]
 
Will not receive any items
roles.name: Buffoon

roles.description: Starts with a [Vest]
roles.name: Bulletproof

roles.description:
Each night after a player is condemned, may choose a player to visit and investigate

May only investigate a player who voted for the condemned player

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is sided with the Mafia
roles.name: Bus Cop

roles.description:
When visiting as a group, will be the only member from the Mafia night meeting to visit and kill the target 

If all Busboys are blocked from visiting, the Mafia will visit their target as a group

Upon death, will reveal as @{role:Mafia]
roles.name: Busboy

roles.description:
On Night 2, must choose a player to serve

When that player dies, the Butler is revealed

Appears as “NOT sided with the Mafia” on investigations
roles.name: Butler

roles.description:
Upon death, all votes will be anonymous the following day

Players can see their own votes but will not see any others
roles.name: Candle

roles.description:
While alive, all non-meeting Mafia-aligned players attend a night meeting with Capo

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Capo

roles.description:
Each night, may choose one player (including themselves) to hush for the following day

Hushed players will be unable to quote and may only send 12 messages that decrease in character limit per message

Cannot choose the same target two nights in a row
roles.name: Cat

roles.description: Upon being condemned, will also kill the last player to vote them
roles.name: Clown

roles.description:
Appears as "NOT sided with the Mafia" on investigations

Upon death, will reveal as @{role:Villager]
roles.name: Con Man

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Cop] and appears as @{role:Cop] upon death

Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is sided with the Mafia

Reports will randomly appear as sided or not, regardless of the player’s actual alignment
roles.name: Confused Cop

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose during the day to convert to a @{role:Mafia]

Conversion occurs immediately after choosing 

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting until converted

Appears as "NOT sided with the Mafia" on investigations until converted
roles.name: Consigliere

roles.description:
Once per game, receives a [Gun] at day start if the Mafia night meeting chooses not to kill

Gun will reveal the shooter

‌
roles.name: Contingency Planner

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is sided with the Mafia
roles.name: Cop

roles.description: Each night, may visit and learn the role of a dead player
roles.name: Coroner

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose a player to visit and convert to a @{role:Traitor]

If the converted Traitor dies, the Corruptor dies as well

If the Corruptor dies, the converted Traitor dies as well
roles.name: Corruptor

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and give them a broken item
roles.name: Counterfeiter

roles.description: Each day, may shout anonymous messages that all players see during the day
roles.name: Crier

roles.description:
Once per game, may overturn the condemning vote and choose a new player to condemn instead

Overturns have priority over a @{role:Governor]

Cannot overturn when the majority is No One or the condemned player is from their faction
roles.name: Crook

roles.description:
Each night, meets with all Cult members and vote on a player to visit and convert to a Cult

Cult members at the start of the game are Cult leaders

If a Cult leader dies, all Cult members (except other leaders) die as well

Wins when Cult are majority
roles.name: Cult

roles.description:
Each night, meets with all Dark Templars

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Dark Templar

roles.description:
Once per game during the day, if the Deathcaller is not the current majority vote and they are voting for a player to condemn, they may mark that player for death

Targeted players will be announced as marked and die at the end of the day

The targeted player will remain marked even if the Deathcaller changes their condemn vote
roles.name: Deathcaller

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Appears as @{role:Cop] on death
roles.name: Decoy

roles.description: Once per game, may convert to a @{role:Mafia] on Night 4
roles.name: Defector

roles.description:
During the day and before Limited Period begins, may choose to defend another player

All votes for the defended player will be removed and they cannot be voted for the rest of that day

Does not affect votes that are frozen by the @{role:Freezer]

If the two targets chosen by a @{role:Pollster] become defended, the poll ends and regular voting resumes

Power refreshes two days after each use
roles.name: Defense Attorney

roles.description: Appears as “sided with Mafia" on investigations
roles.name: Delinquent

roles.description:
Each night, may protect and learn the role of a player

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Dentist

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and learn their role
roles.name: Detective

roles.description:
Once per game, may visit a player at night and plant [TNT] on them

May detonate the TNT during the day to kill the holder

If the TNT target is killed before detonation, the TNT will be recovered the following night

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Detonator

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player from another faction and learn their role

Upon death, reveals as the role of the last player visited
roles.name: Diva

roles.description: Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill
roles.name: Doctor

roles.description: Revealed to all players at the start of the game
roles.name: Dog

roles.description: While alive, counts as 2 towards the Mafia's majority
roles.name: Don

roles.description: Each night, may visit and block a player from performing night actions that require a visit
roles.name: Drunk

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and learn if they met with at least one other player that night
roles.name: Eavesdropper

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player and give them a [Taser]
roles.name: Electrician

roles.description:
Each day, announces the names of all players who visited them the night before

If visited by a group (e.g. the Mafia), only one member’s name will be announced
roles.name: Emcee

roles.description:
At the start of the game, receives a target they must get condemned

Target cannot be Mafia-aligned, @{role:Liaison], @{role:Bounty Hunter], @{role:Cult], @{role:Jester], @{role:Selfish Fool], @{role:Zombie], or @{role:Killer]

Wins when target is condemned

If target is killed before they can be condemned, wins with Town
roles.name: Executioner

roles.description: Starts the game with a [Dreamcatcher]
roles.name: Extrovert

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Revealed to all Mafia-aligned and @{role:Liaison] players at the start of the game

Appears as "sided with the Mafia" on investigations

Upon being condemned, revealed as a @{role:Mafia]
roles.name: Fall Guy

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player from their faction and make them appear as "NOT sided with the Mafia" for investigations that night

Cannot visit themselves
roles.name: Fixer

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit (without any other effect)

Wins upon being condemned
roles.name: Fool

roles.description: Once per game, may visit a player and give them a [Crystal Ball]
roles.name: Fortune Teller

roles.description: Each night, may visit and frame a player from another faction to appear as "sided with the Mafia" for investigations that night
roles.name: Framer

roles.description:
While alive, the Mafia cannot perform night meeting kills

‌
roles.name: Freeloader

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose to freeze all condemn votes

Can only freeze during the day before the Limited Period begins

Freezing is instantaneous

Freezing prevents players from changing their condemn vote, but players who haven't voted may still vote
roles.name: Freezer

roles.description: Each night, may choose one player to visit and give a piece of [Fruit]
roles.name: Fruit Vendor

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and grant them a [Wish]

Can only hand out a maximum of 3 wishes
roles.name: Genie

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Upon death, may send one anonymous message per day and one message per night to any living player

Does not join spectator chat when it dies
roles.name: Ghost

roles.description: Appears as “NOT sided with the Mafia” on investigations
roles.name: Godfather

roles.description: Will not receive any items
roles.name: Goof

roles.description:
Each day, may choose a player

The following night, the chosen player is taken from any night meeting they attend and instead meets with the Gossip
roles.name: Gossip

roles.description:
Once per game, may overturn the condemning vote and choose a new player to condemn instead 

Cannot overturn when the majority vote is No One
roles.name: Governor

roles.description:
Can only be killed by being condemned

Kills all players that visit her
roles.name: Grandma

roles.description:
Can only be killed by being condemned

Learns the name and role of any player that visits him
roles.name: Grandpa

roles.description:
Can only be killed by being condemned

Learns the name and role of any player that visits them

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Grandparent

roles.description: Each night, may visit a dead player and steal any unused items they had when they died
roles.name: Graverobber

roles.description:
At the start of the game, receives a target they must get condemned

Target cannot be Mafia-aligned, @{role:Liaison], @{role:Bounty Hunter], @{role:Cult], @{role:Jester], @{role:Selfish Fool], @{role:Zombie], or @{role:Killer]

Wins when target is condemned

If target is killed before they can be condemned, a new target will be assigned
roles.name: Greedy Executioner

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player

If the chosen player is not town-aligned, the next day will be 1 minute long, have no lock period, and force all players to vote

The Groundhog will only shorten the day once per game
roles.name: Groundhog

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill

If an attempt is made to night kill the player, the Guardian will be killed in their place

If multiple attempts are made, both the player and the Guardian will be killed
roles.name: Guardian

roles.description: Once per game during the day, may choose to learn whether the current majority vote is town-aligned
roles.name: Guilty Conscience

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and fix any broken or sabotaged items they have

Visiting the same target as @{role:Saboteur] will protect items from being sabotaged
roles.name: Handyman

roles.description:
Once per game, can attempt to spare a condemned player

If the condemned is Town-aligned, the vote is cancelled and no one dies

If the condemned is not Town-aligned, both the target and the Hangman will die

Cannot spare themselves from being condemned
roles.name: Hangman

roles.description:
Each night, may select a role from the setup and visit a player

The following day, learns if the visited player is the chosen role
roles.name: Headhunter

roles.description:
Starts with a [Gun]

Gun will not reveal the shooter
roles.name: Hitman

roles.description: Each night, may visit and block a player from another faction from performing night actions that require a visit
roles.name: Hooker

roles.description:
Upon being condemned, may kill another player as well

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), the Hunter will kill their target but also keep their power
roles.name: Hunter

roles.description:
Once per game during the night, may shorten the following day

The next day will be 1 minute long, have no lock period, and force all players to vote
roles.name: Hustler

roles.description:
Once per game, may visit and hypnotize a player at night

The hypnotized player’s first message of the following day will be changed to "I am [the role they see themselves as]" once sent

If the hypnotized player does not speak within the first 25 messages of the day, a message will be generated for them
roles.name: Hypnotist

roles.description:
Cannot be protected from night kills

Kills anyone who tries to protect them
roles.name: Iatrophobe

roles.description: Finds an [Immunity Idol] at the beginning of days 3 and 5
roles.name: Idol Hunter

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a role included in the setup to appear as

Any time the Impostor's role would be seen or revealed, the chosen role will be shown instead

Cannot choose to appear as @{role:Villager], @{role:Bozoman], @{role:Soloman], or Impostor
roles.name: Impostor

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Receives a [Knife] on day 5 and will lose it if not used by the end of the day

If they lose their knife, gains the ability to visit and investigate a player once
roles.name: Impulsive

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Receives a [Knife] at the start of day 4
roles.name: Indignant

roles.description: Each day, learns which players from their faction have been investigated by @{role:Cop] and Cop variants
roles.name: Informant

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Cop] and appears as @{role:Cop] upon death

Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate 

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is sided with the Mafia

Reports will appear as the opposite of the player’s actual alignment
roles.name: Insane Cop

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and intercept other visits to them

Will kill one visitor who is not from their faction who visits their target

If the intercepted player has multiple visitors, one will be killed at random and the identity of the Interceptor will be revealed to all other visitors
roles.name: Interceptor

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and perform one of three actions

May protect them from a night kill

May investigate them and receive a report the following day detailing whether the player is sided with the Mafia

May kill them

Each action can only be used once
roles.name: Jack

roles.description:
If no one is condemned during the day, may choose to jail a player

The following night, the jailed player is taken from any night meeting they attend and instead meets with the Jailer

Identity is hidden from the jailed player during their meeting

Ends the meeting by deciding whether to visit and kill the jailed player or not

While jailed, players cannot receive items, perform new actions, or be killed by players other than the Jailer
roles.name: Jailer

roles.description:
Once per game, may visit the Mafia’s night kill target and hide the player’s role to all but the Janitor

Power is only consumed if the targeted player dies that night
roles.name: Janitor

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a player to visit

Visits do nothing
roles.name: Jaywalker

roles.description: Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill
roles.name: Jekyll

roles.description:
Wins upon death

If multiple Jesters exist, the identities of two players who are not Jesters will be announced when one Jester dies

If multiple Jesters exist, a Jester can win alongside anyone who wins afterwards, regardless of their joint win rules

Game will end upon the death of all Jesters

Factions may not joint win with any Jester whose death ended the game
roles.name: Jester

roles.description:
Each night, must visit and kill a player

Converted to a @{role:Villager] if visited by a @{role:Psychiatrist]

Converted to a @{role:Traitor] if visited by a @{role:Quack]

Wins when among final two alive

Town cannot win while Killer is alive
roles.name: Killer

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose at night to become King

The following day, the King's status will be declared to all players

While in power, the King cannot be shot

While in power, the King's vote will count for 1000 votes

When the day ends, the King will lose all power and revert to normal
roles.name: King

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose at night to visit a player from another faction and convert them to @{role:Regent]

The @{role:Regent] will be forced to use their power at the start of the following day
roles.name: Kingmaker

roles.description: While alive, counts as 3x towards the Mafia's majority
roles.name: Kingpin

roles.description: Will not receive any items
roles.name: Klutz

roles.description: Once per game, may sacrifice themselves during the day to reveal another player’s role
roles.name: Lamb

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and learn if they visited anyone

Does not see who the player visited
roles.name: Lazy Tracker

roles.description:
Upon game start, all non-meeting Mafia-aligned players are recruited to Liaison's faction

Liaison's faction wins when majority

While alive, all Liaison faction members attend a night meeting together

Once per game, may choose a player to visit and kill at night
roles.name: Liaison

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose at night to prevent everyone from speaking the next day

If the Librarian dies before the silent period is over, the silence will end and players may resume speaking again
roles.name: Librarian

roles.description: Revealed to all Mafia faction players and any @{role:Traitor] at the start of the game
roles.name: Linchpin

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to watch

Will watch that night and the following day for any kills involving that player

If the player kills someone, the Lookout will learn their target's role

If the player is killed, the Lookout will learn the murderer's name
roles.name: Lookout

roles.description:
Identity is revealed to other Losers at the start of the game

If one Loser dies, all Losers die
roles.name: Loser

roles.description:
On the first night, must visit and fall in love with a player

Loved players will learn the Lover’s identity and that they have fallen in love with them

If either player dies at any point during the game, the other will die as well

Wins if alive and in love with someone at the end of the game
roles.name: Lover

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill

If the player is protected successfully, either the Luckyguard or the killer is killed
roles.name: Luckyguard

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player (including themselves) and watch for other visitors

Receives a report the next day detailing who visited that player

If a night meeting visits the watched player, Lurker will see only one party member at random
roles.name: Lurker

roles.description:
Once per game during the day, may choose to explode both themselves and another player

Both the Mad Bomber and their target's roles are hidden upon explosion

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Mad Bomber

roles.description: Basic Mafia-aligned role
roles.name: Mafia

roles.description:
Starts the game with a [Gun]

Each night, may choose a player to be revealed as the shooter when the Magician’s gun is fired
roles.name: Magician

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player from another faction and take any item given to them that same night
roles.name: Mailman

roles.description:
At the start of the game, learns the identities of current members of the Mafia faction

Appears as @{role:Villager] upon death

Wins instead of the Mafia faction if alive when they would win
roles.name: Manipulator

roles.description:
Starts with a [Gun]

Gun will not reveal the shooter

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Marksman

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Upon being condemned, may kill another player as well

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), Martyr will learn their identity and retain their power
roles.name: Martyr

roles.description:
Each night, meets with other Masons to vote on a player to visit and convert to a Mason

If the visited player is Mafia-aligned or @{role:Liaison], visiting Masons will die

If the visited player is a @{role:Cult], the player will die
roles.name: Mason

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill

Cannot choose the same player two nights in a row
roles.name: Medic

roles.description:
Each day, may ask a yes or no question to a dead player at night 

Answers will be received the following day

Players who die while this role is alive do not join spectator chat
roles.name: Medium

roles.description:
At the start of the game, learns the identities of current Mafia-aligned players and any @{role:Liaison]

Learns the identity of any @{role:King] and is also revealed to them

Cannot be killed on Night 1

Upon death, all Town-aligned players die as well
roles.name: Merlin

roles.description:
Once per game, may visit and hypnotize a player at night

The mesmerized player’s first message of the following day will be changed to "I am [the role they see themselves as]" once sent

If the mesmerized player does not speak within the first 25 messages of the day, a message will be generated for them
roles.name: Mesmer

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Appears as “sided with the Mafia” on investigations

Upon being condemned, appears as @{role:Mafia]
roles.name: Miller

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose to advance the current day timer to Limited Period

If the Limited Period setting is disabled, the timer will be set to 1:30 remaining
roles.name: Moderator

roles.description:
Once per game, during either the day or at night, may kill a player

If the power is used during the day, kills immediately

If the power is used at night, Moko visits, and the kill is strengthened and pierces through protections

If another Moko, a @{role:Bolthus] or a @{role:Tapioca] are killed with this power, the Moko dies
roles.name: Moko

roles.description:
Each day, receives a report detailing who was investigated by @{role:Cop] and Cop variants

If there are multiple Cops, one is randomly chosen to share their report
roles.name: Mole

roles.description:
At the start of the game, receives a target they must get condemned

When their target is condemned, gains the power to visit and kill a player at night

When their target dies, a new target will be acquired

Target cannot be Mafia-aligned, @{role:Liaison], @{role:Fool], @{role:Jester], or @{role:Selfish Fool]

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Mudslinger

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Cop] and appears as @{role:Cop] upon death

Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate 

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is sided with the Mafia

Reports will always appear “NOT sided with the Mafia”, regardless of the target’s actual alignment
roles.name: Naive Cop

roles.description:
If killed at night, the Nervous Sleeper will explode a bomb and kill the player that targeted them as well 

If killed by a night meeting (e.g. the Mafia), one member will be chosen at random to explode

If targeted by multiple night kills, the explosion will kill one player from each group
roles.name: Nervous Sleeper

roles.description:
Disarms any @{role:Bomb] or @{role:Nervous Sleeper] targeted

Does not appear on any visit reports 

If targeted player is a @{role:Shogun], the Ninja will die instead
roles.name: Ninja

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill

Visits will block the protected player from performing any night actions
roles.name: Nurse

roles.description: Starts the game with a [Crystal Ball]
roles.name: Oracle

roles.description: Wins instead of Town if alive when they win
roles.name: Overlord

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and shield a player from violence 

Shielded players are protected from one kill that night and one kill or condemnation the following day

Wins if they successfully prevent two kills or condemnations
roles.name: Pacifist

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and paint a player from another faction

Painted players will appear as “sided with the Mafia” on investigations for that night and the following night
roles.name: Painter

roles.description:
Upon being condemned, may reveal another player to all Mafia faction players

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), the Paparazzo will reveal their target but also keep their power
roles.name: Paparazzo

roles.description:
When visited, will learn the name of the visitor and receive a [Gun]

Cannot receive a Gun from the same visitor more than once

Guns received from visitors will not reveal the shooter
roles.name: Paranoiac

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Cop] and appears as @{role:Cop] upon death

Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate

Receives a report the next day detailing if the target is sided with the Mafia

Reports will always appear “sided with the Mafia”, regardless of the player’s actual alignment
roles.name: Paranoid Cop

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate 

Receives a report the next day detailing whether that player and the last player investigated share an alignment
roles.name: Parity Cop

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose during the day to throw a party the following night

That night, all players are brought to a night meeting party

Individual night actions can still be performed, but other night meetings will not meet or perform their group actions
roles.name: Party Host

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose during the day to throw a party the following night

That night, all players are brought to a night meeting party

Individual night actions can still be performed, but other night meetings will not meet or perform their group actions

Visits all players who attended the meeting and gives them a [Party Popper]
roles.name: Party Planner

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player (including themselves) and watch for other visitors

Receives a report the next day detailing who visited that player

If a night meeting visits the watched player, Patroller will see only one party member at random
roles.name: Patroller

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Revealed to all Mafia-aligned and @{role:Liaison] players at the start of the game

Appears as "sided with the Mafia" on investigations
roles.name: Patsy

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a player to haunt

The first time they are targeted by a night kill, Phantom will kill the haunted player instead

Power can only be used at night and redirect a kill once
roles.name: Phantom

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose during the day to take a photo of a player

The following day, will receive a photograph detailing the player’s role

The name of the player photographed will be announced when the picture is taken
roles.name: Photographer

roles.description:
Upon being condemned, may kill another player as well

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), the Poacher will kill their target but also keep their power
roles.name: Poacher

roles.description:
Once per game, may force all players to unvote and restrict the condemn votes between two players of their choice

Only one Pollster may use their power per day
roles.name: Pollster

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit and test for lying

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is a Liar

Lying roles will either reveal incorrectly or create false alignment readings for themselves or others
roles.name: Polygraph

roles.description:
Revealed to all Town-aligned players at the start of the game

Upon death, all Town-aligned players die as well
roles.name: President

roles.description:
Each night, may select a role from the setup and visit a player

The following day, learns if the visited player is the chosen role
roles.name: Profiler

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose a player to prosecute

The following night, all players are brought to a night meeting in which only the Prosecutor and the prosecuted player may speak

Other players will act as the jury and anonymously vote whether the prosecuted player is innocent or guilty

Innocent players will return the following day, but guilty players will be visited and killed by the Prosecutor

While on trial, the prosecuted player cannot receive items, perform actions, or be protected or killed by players other than the Prosecutor

Individual night actions of other players can still be performed, but night meetings (like the Mafia’s) will not meet or perform group actions
roles.name: Prosecutor

roles.description: Each night, may visit and prevent a player (or themselves) from conversions
roles.name: Psychiatrist

roles.description:
Revealed to all players at the start of the game

Does not count towards Town's majority
roles.name: Puppy

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and douse them in gasoline

Once per game, may light a match during the day and kill all doused players 

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Pyromaniac

roles.description: Each night, may visit and prevent a player (or themselves) from conversions
roles.name: Quack

roles.description:
Upon death, the Mafia will be unable to speak with one another at the following night's meeting

Votes will also be hidden from one another for that night
roles.name: Radio Operator

roles.description:
Once per game during the day, may mark a player for death

The following night, the marked player will discover they are doomed to die and receive a [Will]

The Reaper will visit and kill their marked at the end of the night
roles.name: Reaper

roles.description:
Upon their first day, will ascend the throne

While in power, the Regent's status will be declared to all players

While in power, the Regent cannot be shot

While in power, the Regent's vote will count for 1000 votes

When the day ends, the Regent will lose all power
roles.name: Regent

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Mafia]

At the start of day 2, converts to @{role:Freeloader]
roles.name: Remorseful

roles.description: Condemn vote counts as two votes
roles.name: Representative

roles.description: If attempted to be killed, will bleed for a day before dying
roles.name: Revenant

roles.description:
Starts with a [Gun]

Gun will not reveal shooter
roles.name: Rifleman

roles.description:
Upon being condemned, will also kill the first and last player to vote them

Upon being condemned, will kill all players still voting for a Town-aligned player

Does not die. Instead, will return when you least expect it: next Winter Holidays!
roles.name: Robot Santa

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

If killed by a Mafia faction player, the Rogue will survive and be converted to a @{role:Traitor]

If the conversion is blocked, the Rogue will die

If converted to another role the same night they are killed, the Rogue will die as the new role
roles.name: Rogue

roles.description: Once per game, may choose to visit all other living players that night
roles.name: Runner

roles.description: Each night, may visit a player from another faction and break any item they have currently and receive that night
roles.name: Saboteur

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Upon being condemned, may protect another player from a kill for the following night

Identity and power will be revealed to the Saint but not used if the vote is interrupted (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor])
roles.name: Saint

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and track a player from another faction at night

Receives a report the next day detailing who that player visited
roles.name: Scout

roles.description: Wins if alive when Town loses
roles.name: Scumbag

roles.description:
Each day, may choose a player to shield 

If the shielded player is shot at, the Secret Service will be shot instead

May change which player they are shielding freely
roles.name: Secret Service

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and block all others that would visit them from performing night actions

Does not block night meeting actions from targeting the visited player
roles.name: Security Guard

roles.description:
Each day, receives the names of 3 living players

At least one of those players is Mafia-aligned or a @{role:Liaison]

If visited at night, no message will be received

If no Mafia remain or if 3 or fewer players are left, receives a message with no names
roles.name: Seer

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit (without any other effect)

Wins upon being condemned

Factions may not joint win with Selfish Fool
roles.name: Selfish Fool

roles.description: Once per game, may choose a player to visit and kill
roles.name: Sergeant

roles.description:
Each night, must predict a player that will be condemned the following day

Wins after making two correct predictions
roles.name: Shaman

roles.description:
Starts with a [Gun] that will not reveal the shooter

Dies the night after they fire their gun

Wins if the game ends the day their gun is fired, preventing anyone else from winning

May win with other Sharpshooters if more than one meets their win condition the same day
roles.name: Sharpshooter

roles.description:
Starts with a [Gun]

Gun will reveal shooter
roles.name: Sheriff

roles.description:
Cannot be converted and will kill any player who attempts to convert them 

Will kill any @{role:Ninja] that attempts to kill them
roles.name: Shogun

roles.description:
Can only be killed by being condemned

Each night, may choose a player who they believe will visit them

If that player visits the Siren that night, the Siren will kill them

Wins if they kill two players
roles.name: Siren

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Each night, will sleepwalk and randomly visit another player (with no other effect)
roles.name: Sleepwalker

roles.description: Once per game, may choose during the day to reveal their role and the role of another player
roles.name: Snoop

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a role included in the setup to appear as

Cannot appear as @{role:Villager], @{role:Bozoman], @{role:Impostor], or Soloman

This role was requested by Soloman.
roles.name: Soloman

roles.description: Upon death, all other deaths will not reveal roles for the remainder of the game
roles.name: Speaker

roles.description:
Each day, may send anonymous messages to any role during the day 

Anonymous messages look identical to @{role:Agent]
roles.name: Spy

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Revealed to all Mafia-aligned and @{role:Liaison] players at the start of the game
roles.name: Stooge

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a player to visit

Cannot choose the same player two nights in a row

Wins with the last player visited

Cannot win with @{role:Bounty Hunter], @{role:Executioner], @{role:Greedy Executioner], or @{role:Jester]

Does not count towards any faction's majority
roles.name: Stray Kitten

roles.description: Once per game, may visit and strengthen the Mafia's night kill to pierce through protections
roles.name: Strongman

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose a player from another faction to visit and seduce

Seduced player learns that they have fallen in love, but not with whom

If Succubus dies, the charmed player also dies

"First you succ, then you bus."
roles.name: Succubus

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose to learn which roles are still alive 

If visited by another player on the same night Surveyor uses their power, no information will be given and the power will not be used
roles.name: Surveyor

roles.description: Wins if alive when the game ends
roles.name: Survivor

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Appears as "sided with the Mafia" on investigations
roles.name: Suspect

roles.description:
Once per game, may overturn the condemning vote and choose a new player to condemn instead

If they condemn a Mafia-aligned player or @{role:Liaison], the Suspect Governor’s power renews

If they condemn a Town-aligned player, the Suspect Governor also dies

If they condemn a Third-party player, the Suspect Governor neither dies nor renews their power
roles.name: Suspect Governor

roles.description:
Starts with a [Gun] that will reveal shooter

If they shoot a Mafia-aligned player or a @{role:Liaison], the Suspect Mind receives another gun the next day

If they shoot a Town-aligned player, the Suspect Mind also dies

If they shoot a Third-party player, the Suspect Mind neither dies nor receives a new gun
roles.name: Suspect Mind

roles.description:
Once per game, may choose to hide the condemned player’s role to all but the Sweeper

Cannot hide themselves

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), power will not be used
roles.name: Sweeper

roles.description:
On Day 3, must choose between receiving a [Vest] or a [Crystal Ball]

Will receive items at the end of that day
roles.name: Tactician

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player from another faction to visit and tag

Receives a report the next day detailing the role of that player
roles.name: Tagger

roles.description: Twice per game, may visit a player at night and give them a [Suit]
roles.name: Tailor

roles.description:
Starts with a [Vest]

Each night, may choose a player from another faction

If the chosen player attempts to visit anyone that night, they will visit the Tank instead
roles.name: Tank

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Miller]

Appears as “sided with the Mafia” on investigations

Upon being killed, appears as @{role:Miller]

Upon being condemned, appears as @{role:Mafia]
roles.name: Tapioca

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and collect overdue taxes

Will learn the taxed player’s alignment and convert upon visiting 

If the player is Town-aligned, they are converted to a @{role:Villager]

If the player is Mafia-aligned, they are converted to a @{role:Mafia]

If the player is Third Party, they are converted to a @{role:Scumbag]

Wins if alive when Town loses
roles.name: Tax Collector

roles.description: Each night, meets with all Templars
roles.name: Templar

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and steal any items they have

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Thief

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit and kill

Upon a successful kill, will convert to the targeted player’s role

The killed player’s role will be hidden upon death, and instead reveal as their alignment (e.g. Town-aligned, Mafia-aligned, or Third Party)
roles.name: Thorne

roles.description: Once per game, may learn the role of the player who voted first on the condemned vote
roles.name: Ticketmaster

roles.description:
Each night, must choose a player to visit

Visits, while annoying, do nothing
roles.name: Tourist

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and track through the night

Receives a report the next day detailing who that player visited
roles.name: Tracker

roles.description: Wins with the Mafia
roles.name: Traitor

roles.description:
Each night, may entrance a player

If a player attempts to visit the Trancer, they will be redirected to the entranced player instead
roles.name: Trancer

roles.description:
Each night, may visit a player and watch for other visitors 

If other players visit their target that night, will kill one other visitor 

Will prioritize killing based on alignment, targeting a Mafia-aligned visitor first and only killing a Town-aligned visitor if no Mafia-aligned or Third Party player visited
roles.name: Trapper

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Upon being condemned, may give out a [Gun]

May choose whether the gun fires as normal or is broken

Gun will reveal the shooter

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), Trickster will learn their identity and retain their power
roles.name: Trickster

roles.description: Once per game, may convert into a Mafia-aligned role that has died
roles.name: Understudy

roles.description: The host has chosen to hide what roles are in the setup.
roles.name: Unknown

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit and learn about their role

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is a Vanilla role (@{role:Villager], @{role:Mafia], or @{role:Scumbag]) or not
roles.name: Vanilla Cop

roles.description:
Each night, may choose to visit a player

If the player has one or more [Gun]s, the Vash will randomly choose one and remove its bullets
roles.name: Vash

roles.description:
Three times per game, may choose to stay alert at night

While alert, the Veteran cannot be killed and will instead kill their visitors

If visited by a group while alert, a random party member will die
roles.name: Veteran

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and protect a player from a night kill

If the player is targeted but protected, converts them to a @{role:Puppy]

If the player is not Town-aligned, the Veterinarian will neither protect nor convert them
roles.name: Veterinarian

roles.description:
Each night, may visit and kill a player

If the Vigilante and the Mafia night meeting target the same player, both the visited player and the Vigilante will die
roles.name: Vigilante

roles.description: Basic Town-aligned role.
roles.name: Villager

roles.description:
Upon being condemned, all players will be protected from kills by Mafia-aligned roles and any @{role:Killer] for the following night

Converts to a @{role:Villager] when blocked by @{role:Hooker]
roles.name: Virgin

roles.description:
Does not attend the Mafia night meeting at the start of the game

Each night, may visit a player and check if they attend the Mafia night meeting

If the player is attending, will join the meeting for the rest of the game

If the player is not attending (e.g. temporarily removed by @{role:Jailer]) on the night the Wanderer visits, will not join the meeting

If recruited by another faction, joining the Mafia night meeting will cause the Wanderer to be recruited back into the Mafia

‌
roles.name: Wanderer

roles.description:
Each night, may choose a player to visit and investigate

Receives a report the next day detailing if the player is sided with the Mafia

Does not attend the Mafia night meeting
roles.name: Wannabe

roles.description: Once per game, may visit a player and give them a [Dreamcatcher]
roles.name: Weaver

roles.description:
Once per game, may wiretap a player during the day 

Will hear all messages from that player's night meeting the following night, though the identities of the speakers will be hidden
roles.name: Wiretapper

roles.description:
Sees self as @{role:Villager]

Upon being condemned, may choose to privately reveal the role of a player to another player of their choice

If the vote is altered (e.g. overturned by @{role:Governor]), Witness will learn their identity and retain their power
roles.name: Witness

roles.description:
Once per game, may visit at night and convert a player from another faction to a @{role:Mafia]

Dies if conversion is successful
roles.name: Yakuza

roles.description:
Each night, must visit and convert another player to a Zombie

Dies if conversion is successful

If any Zombie is alive in final 2, all Zombies win

Town cannot win while Zombie is alive
roles.name: Zombie
